item.title: Contact
item.description: The best way to reach me is by email at ngsanogo@gmail.com. You can contact you about anything but if it’s about programming, I advise you to post it on Stack Overflow instead. You’ll have all the answers you are looking for and even better answer for sure. The Kamita association hold events every first Saturday of the month. So if you want to meet me, check on the association’s website or on assomaliennes.

item.title: Project
item.description: Here are the projects I have worked on or I’m working on: Website Website This project is about building a website with hugo and blogdown

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Issa Sanogo. This is my personnel website. For more information about me, go on my homepage or consult my resume. This blog is about statistics, data in general with a special focus on R and open source software. As Errare humanum est, some post certainly contain error so please feel free to push a correction request directly on Github. This site has been created with blogdown and the theme is hugo-sustain, a Hugo theme.

item.title: Consulting
item.description: Get in touch if you have a project in mind. I’d love to discuss about it and figure out how I can help you. Data science You have a data science project but you don’t have the time or expertise to complete it? I can help you. Data analysis is a real passion for me. I can also assist you in doing your project by yourself by setting up coaching sessions.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Contact information Email: ngsanogo@gmail.com LinkdIn: Issa Sanogo Twitter: @ngsanogo Adress: Suresnes, 92150, France Short biography I’m Issa Sanogo, I’m a huge nerd passioned by data science. I love learning and teaching. I’m in favor of popularizing sience. Education Master’s degree in mathematical engineering applied to life sciences at UFR Math-Info Université Paris DESCARTES, France Bachelor’s degree in science at Lycée Soundiata Keita, Mali.
